sources.title: Of One Blood (1944) SPENCER WILLIAMS
sources.description:
BLACK HISTORY MONTH
Writer/Director: Spencer Williams
Stars: Elroy Easley, John Hemmings, Edwin T. Henry 

Two orphaned brothers grow up to become a lawyer and a police officer. The pair work together to rid their city of a bootlegging gang, whose leader turns out to be their long-lost older brother!

metadata.Plot: Orphaned brothers grow up to become a police officer and a lawyer, and work to rid their city of a bootlegging gang.
metadata.Actors: Elroy Easley, John Hemmings, Edwin T. Henry
